text: When the revolution is at its bloodiest crack it is when you hear the screams: "To kill the royal turkeys! It would not be a complete and dignified revolution if we did not hear the cry of the ex-libris revolutionary: "To kill the royal turkeys! Then the crowd scatters through palaces and zoos and there's no live, feathered peacock left. Then only then will the counterrevolution begin. FIN
title: Revolución
author: Ramón Gómez de la Serna
